title: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 does not mention that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 does not mention that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
OB: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 should clearly state that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
EB: Expected result: The phrase in 7.1.1 should indicate that if a custom cookie name is used, the Reload link should be http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
SR: Update the Servlet 3.0 specification documentation (ch.7.1.1) to clearly mention that custom cookie names affect URL rewriting
